subject: Help
description_text:
Good morning, I would like to have a helping hand in the purchase of
Simsonn Haptic Pedels.

I have the pedals Spro P3 H3.
Do I need the new box? Which one should I buy? Plus x pedal control box or
Pro x ultra pedal box?

Thanks for your help

conversations.body_text: Hi Telmo Carvalho,  For customers who already own the Pro pedal, you can choose to upgrade to the PlusX control board. If needed, you can also upgrade the hydraulic rod and damping system. Please find the purchase link below:    PlusX    https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498  ​   Plus Upgrade Kit  ​https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit
